Text:
Mr. Spock, it's awesome to have you back! Believe me, you make the internet a better place. 

Is there any possibility of you uploading John Smith's work like Indigo Prime, Devlin Waugh or Rogue Trooper? I downloaded your Scarab torrent and I'm interested in his work.
Thanks Oneiromancer12. I'll take a look and see if those books are available.
